author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Gladstone Capital Says Appointed Julia Ryan To Serve In Temporary Capacity As Acting Principal Financial Officer SEC Filing
text:
April 10 (Reuters) - Gladstone Capital Corp:
* APPOINTED JULIA RYAN TO SERVE IN TEMPORARY CAPACITY AS ACTING PRINCIPAL FINANCIAL OFFICER - SEC FILING
* RYANâ€™S APPOINTMENT MADE IN CONSIDERATION OF CURRENT CFO NICOLE SCHALTENBRAND TAKING TEMPORARY FAMILY MEDICAL LEAVE OF ABSENCE
* SCHALTENBRAND'S TEMPORARY LEAVE OF ABSENCE WILL END IN JUNE , AND SHE WILL RETURN TO POSITION AS CFO Source text ( bit.ly/2GOdicZ ) Further company coverage: (reuters.briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
